column1: For release on delivery  10:00 a.m. E DT (9:00 a.m. local time)  October 19, 2015         Identifying Opportunities for Reducing Regulatory Burdens on Community  Banks     Remarks by   Lael Brainard   Member   Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System   at  The Economic Growth and Regulatory Paperwork Reduction Act  Outreach Meeting   Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago      October 19, 2015    On behalf of the Federal Reserve Board, I want to thank everyone for participating in  the fifth outreach meeting held as part of the Economic Growth and Regulatory Paperwork Reduction Act (EGRPRA) review process.
